title: BUZZ-U.S. STOCKS ON THE MOVE-Century Aluminum, Express Inc, Frontline
text:
40.65 +2.13 
(For faster updates on individual market-movers, Eikon users please use search string "STXBZ US"; for the Day Ahead newsletter, http://link.reuters.com/mex49s; for the Morning News Call newsletter, http://link.reuters.com/nex49s ) U.S (Other OTC: UBGXF - news ) . stock indexes were up on Wednesday. The Dow Jones industrial average was up 2.16 percent at 16,005.07, the S&P 500 was up 2.20 percent at 1,908.77 and the Nasdaq Composite was up 2.39 percent at 4,613.98. 
** SCHLUMBERGER LTD, $70.71, -2.50 pct 
** CAMERON INTERNATIONAL, $61.37, +44.50 pct 
Schlumberger (Hanover: SCL.HA - news ) , the world's No.1 oilfield services company, agreed to buy oilfield equipment provider Cameron in a deal valued at $14.8 bln. 
Cameron shareholders will get $66.36 - $14.44 in cash and 0.716 of a Schlumberger share - for each share held, a premium of 56.3 percent to Cameron's Tuesday close. 
** ABERCROMBIE & FITCH CO (NYSE: ANF - news ) , $19.85, +14.94 pct 
The apparel retailer reported surprise second-quarter profit, helped by higher demand for Hollister and abercrombie Kids brands. 
** GOOGLE INC C, $614.3353, +5.55 pct 
** GOOGLE INC A, $646, +5.47 pct 
Goldman Sachs (NYSE: GS-PB - news ) added the tech giant's stock to its "conviction buy" list. Broker put a $800 price target on Google (Xetra: A0B7FY - news ) 's Class A shares, implying a 31 percent rise from current levels. 
** AMAZON.COM INC, $484.65, +3.92 pct 
Evercore Partners (NYSE: EVR - news ) raises the e-commerce company's stock to "buy" from "hold". Out of 43, 36 brokerages rate the stock "buy" or higher while 7 rate it "hold". 
** OSHKOSH CORP, $40.71, +5.69 pct 
The U.S. specialty truck maker won a $6.75 billion contract to build 17,000 light tactical vehicles to replace the aging Humvees used by the U.S. Army and Marine Corps. 
** QUALCOMM INC, $55.31, +2.65 pct 
The chipmaker said it agreed to sell its UK L-Band spectrum to Vodafone Group Plc (NasdaqGS: VOD - news ) and Hutchison (HKSE: 0013-OL.HK - news ) 3G UK Ltd in two separate deals. Qualcomm (Hanover: QCI.HA - news ) did not disclose the terms of the deal. 
** CENTURY ALUMINUM CO (NasdaqGS: CENX - news ) , $4.16, -10.54 pct 
The company, which is owned by Glencore PLC (Xetra: A1JAGV - news ) , said on Tuesday it will idle its Hawesville, Kentucky, smelter, the first aluminum plant to shut in years as sinking prices and increased Chinese exports harm producers. 
** FRONTLINE LTD (LSE: FRO.L - news ) , $2.47, +6.47 pct 
The Norwegian shipping company said it will start quarterly dividend as soon as it completes merger with Frontline 2012 Ltd, which was spun off 3 years ago. 
** EXPRESS INC (NYSE: EXPR - news ) , $19.16, +13.37 pct 
The apparel retailer raised full-year adjusted profit forecast for second time in 2015 and reported second-quarter profit and sales above expectations, helped by better-than-expected rise in comparable sales. 
(Compiled by Arunima Banerjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila)
